name: Detailed Papers and Projects Information
desc: If you want to see detailed project information below, please visit the 'Who Am I' post.

name: [Project] MINT64 OS
desc: 64bit multicore operating system development from scratch. The building process was published in two books, 64-bit multi-core OS principles and structure, Vol1 & Vol2.

name: [Project] BitLeaker for Mounting a BitLocker-locked partition with a TPM vulnerability
desc: A mounting tool for a BitLocker-locked partition with the S3 sleep vulnerability. It was released at Black Hat Europe 2019.

name: [Project] Napper for Checking a TPM Vulnerability, CVE-2018-6622
desc: TPM vulnerability checking tool for CVE-2018-6622 related to S3 sleep. It was published at Black Hat Asia 2019.

name: [Project] Shadow-Box v1 for x86 and Gatekeeper
desc: The lightweight hypervisor-based kernel protector for x86. It was introduced at Black Hat Asia 2017, Black Hat Asia Arsenal 2017, HITBSecConf 2017, and beVX 2018.

name: [Project] Shadow-Box v2 for ARM
desc: The ARM TrustZone-based kernel protector for ARM. It was introduced at Black Hat Asia 2018.

name: [Project] IRON-HID
desc: Create your own bad USB! It was introduced at HITBSecConf 2017.

name: [Patches and CVEs] Contributions and Security Patches
desc: Open-source contributions and security patches for Linux Kernel, Trusted Boot, and TPM2.0-TSS.
